programme.desc: The survivors encounter unfamiliar faces outside the safety of their community's walls and must decide whether or not this new group can be trusted.

programme.desc: A small rescue mission braves a dangerous herd in their hunt for a missing comrade, only to discover a surprising threat that could doom them all.
